p: The pGC was modified based on the Agilent 7890B gas chromatograph system (Agilent model 7200, Santa Clara, CA, USA). It was equipped with a HP-5 capillary column (30 m × 0.53 mm i.d., film thickness 1.0 µm), a G4513A autosampler, a flame ionization detector (FID), a modular analytical system and a preparative fraction collector (Gerstel Company, Mülheim, Germany) equipped with a home-made cold trap cooling system.
